title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally; supports Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and more.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; npm package ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; PyPI package langchain-ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; Docker-ready with file upload, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven artifact ollama4j.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models; cargo install ollama-cli.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI copilot powered by Ollama; marketplace name "ollama-copilot".

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama generators and embedders; PyPI package ollama-haystack.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) usage; available on Docker Hub ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes; chart repo ollama-helm.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client for Ollama; NuGet package Ollama.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community index of language SDKs (Go, PHP, Dart, Swift) for Ollama.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of pre-converted GGUF models ready for ollama pull (e.g., llama3, mistral, codellama).

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store; Python Flask app.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats via Ollama; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-macos-app
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app for Ollama; download from releases.
